text:
PRODUCT WARRANTY AND SUPPORT DOCUMENTATION

Product: Premium Customer Support Chatbot System
Version: 1.0
Last Updated: 2024

=== WARRANTY INFORMATION ===

Hardware Warranty:
- Coverage Period: 12 months from purchase date
- Coverage: Manufacturing defects, hardware failures
- Exclusions: Accidental damage, misuse, unauthorized repairs
- Claim Process: Contact support with proof of purchase and description of issue

Software Warranty:
- We guarantee the software will perform according to specifications
- If the chatbot fails to initialize properly, we provide:
  1. Free technical support to diagnose the issue
  2. Replacement license if the issue cannot be resolved
  3. Full refund if you're unsatisfied within 30 days

Performance Warranty:
- The system is guaranteed to process queries and return responses
- Minimum performance metrics:
  - Query response time: < 5 seconds
  - System uptime: 99.5%
  - Accuracy on sample knowledge base: > 90%

=== TECHNICAL SUPPORT ===

=== TECHNICAL SUPPORT ===

Support Channels:
1. Email: support@company.com
2. Phone: 1-800-SUPPORT (1-800-787-7678)
3. Online Help Portal: https://help.company.com
4. Community Forum: https://community.company.com

Support Hours:
- Monday-Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (EST)
- Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM (EST)
- Sunday: Closed (automated support available)
- Emergency support available 24/7 for critical issues

=== TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE ===

Common Issues and Solutions:

1. Chatbot won't initialize
   - Ensure Ollama is running: `ollama serve`
   - Check model is pulled: `ollama pull mistral`
   - Verify Python dependencies: `pip install -r requirements.txt`
   - Check port 11434 is not blocked

- Ensure Ollama is running: `ollama serve`
   - Check model is pulled: `ollama pull mistral`
   - Verify Python dependencies: `pip install -r requirements.txt`
   - Check port 11434 is not blocked

2. Out of memory errors
   - Switch to smaller model (e.g., phi instead of mistral)
   - Reduce embedding batch size in config
   - Close other applications

3. Slow response times
   - Check CPU usage - ensure no other heavy processes
   - Consider quantized model: `ollama pull mistral:7b-instruct-q4_0`
   - Reduce chunk context size in config

4. Inaccurate answers
   - Check knowledge base documents are loaded correctly
   - Verify document formatting
   - Increase top_k chunks in config
   - Review RAG prompt in config.py

5. Vector database corruption
   - Delete vector_store folder
   - Restart application to rebuild index
   - All knowledge will be rebuilt from source documents

=== OPTIMIZATION TIPS ===

5. Vector database corruption
   - Delete vector_store folder
   - Restart application to rebuild index
   - All knowledge will be rebuilt from source documents

=== OPTIMIZATION TIPS ===

For faster performance:
- Use quantized model versions
- Reduce embedding batch size
- Disable source attribution if not needed
- Use CPU acceleration with proper processor

For better accuracy:
- Increase top_k to 10-15
- Lower relevance threshold to 0.3
- Add more specific documents to knowledge base
- Fine-tune RAG prompt for your use case

For lower memory usage:
- Use smaller embedding model
- Use smaller LLM (Phi-3 over Mistral 7B)
- Limit vector store size
- Reduce batch sizes

=== UPDATES AND PATCHES ===

We regularly release updates to improve performance and accuracy.
To update:
1. Backup your knowledge_base and vector_store folders
2. Download latest version
3. Run: python src/app.py (it will rebuild indexes)

To update:
1. Backup your knowledge_base and vector_store folders
2. Download latest version
3. Run: python src/app.py (it will rebuild indexes)

Release notes and updates available at: https://github.com/company/chatbot

=== DATA AND PRIVACY ===

Your Data:
- All data stays on your local machine
- No data is sent to external servers
- Knowledge base files remain in your control
- Vector indexes stored locally

Privacy:
- No telemetry or usage tracking
- No user behavior analysis
- No data collection
- Completely private inference

=== LICENSE ===

This software is provided under the MIT License.
See LICENSE.txt for details.

=== SUPPORT CONTACT ===

For any additional support needs, please contact:

Email: support@company.com
Phone: 1-800-SUPPORT
Web: https://support.company.com
Hours: Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST

We're here to help!

Q: What is your return policy?
A: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. The item must be in its original condition with all tags attached. You'll need a receipt or proof of purchase. Simply visit our returns center to initiate the return process. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

Q: How long does shipping take?
A: Shipping times depend on your chosen method:

- Standard Shipping (5-7 business days): Free for orders over $50
- Express Shipping (2-3 business days): $9.99
- Overnight Shipping (1 business day): $24.99

Please note that these timeframes are estimates and may be affected by holidays or weather conditions.

Q: What payment methods do you accept?
A: We accept all major payment methods:

- Credit Cards: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover
- Digital Wallets: Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal
- Installment Plans: Afterpay (4 interest-free payments), Klarna (flexible payment options)
- Bank Transfers available for corporate accounts

Discover
- Digital Wallets: Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal
- Installment Plans: Afterpay (4 interest-free payments), Klarna (flexible payment options)
- Bank Transfers available for corporate accounts

All transactions are secured with SSL encryption.

Q: How do I track my order?
A: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your package on our website or directly on the carrier's website. Click the 'Track Order' button in your account dashboard to get real-time updates on your delivery status.

Q: Do you offer international shipping?
A: Yes! We ship to over 180 countries worldwide. International shipping costs and times vary by destination. During checkout, you'll see the exact shipping cost for your location. Most international orders arrive within 10-21 business days. Duties and taxes may apply depending on your country.

y destination. During checkout, you'll see the exact shipping cost for your location. Most international orders arrive within 10-21 business days. Duties and taxes may apply depending on your country.

Q: What is your warranty policy?
A: All products come with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. This does not cover accidental damage, normal wear, or misuse. For warranty claims, contact our support team with proof of purchase. We'll either repair or replace your item at no cost.

Q: How can I contact customer support?
A: You can reach our customer support team through multiple channels:

- Email: support@company.com (24-hour response time)
- Phone: 1-800-123-4567 (Mon-Fri, 9am-6pm EST)
- Live Chat: Available on our website (Mon-Fri, 10am-8pm EST)
- Social Media: @companyname on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter

We're here to help with any questions or concerns!

Q: Are your products eco-friendly?
A: Yes, sustainability is important to us. Our products are made using:

- Recycled and recyclable materials where possible
- Sustainable manufacturing processes
- Eco-friendly packaging (all packaging is recyclable or compostable)
- Partnerships with certified sustainable suppliers

We're committed to reducing our environmental impact and offer carbon-neutral shipping options.
